instructions: Log in to the Alexa app on your mobile device. Tap the Conversations icon; the little text bubble at the bottom of the screen. Follow the prompts to confirm your name, allow access to your contact list, and verify your phone number (with an SMS code). Tap the hamburger icon in the upper left to expand the menu. Tap Settings and select the first Echo you want to enable from the list. Under General , look for Drop In and select On if it's not already selected. Tap Drop In and select Only My Household to restrict this feature to devices in your home. Repeat for your remaining devices.
